description.narrative: The proposed project will develop the transmission infrastructure for evacuation of power in a reliable manner from the solar power generation plants to be located in the 2,500 hectares Charanka solar park located in Patan district of Gujarat. The solar park will site over 500 MW of both solar photovoltaic (PV) and concentrated solar power (CSP) plants.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Development of reliable solar power transmission infrastructure for the successful operation of the solar park

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Up to 500 MW of power could be evacuated from the Charanka solar park over the transmission link to the Gujarat and national grid commencing in 2014(2010 baseline: 0 MW)

description.narrative: Development of reliable solar power transmission infrastructure for the successful operation of the solar park
